officialTitle: Intraperitoneal Dexmedetomidine as an Adjuvant to Bupivacaine for Management of Pain in Children Undergoing Laparoscopic Appendicectomy: A Prospective Randomized Trial
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients are of American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status I and II, aged 8-14 years old, of both gender, with suspected acute appendicitis scheduled for laparoscopic appendicectomy.
* Must have minimum age of 8 Years
* Must have maximum age of 14 Years
exclusionCriteria: * The diagnosis of developmental delay, attention deficit disorder, chronic pain, psychiatric illness, previous open abdominal surgery, the presence of a gastrostomy, ventricular-peritoneal shunt or other abdominal prosthesis, immunosuppression, and those allergic to any of the medications.
